Class Store

java.lang.Object
  Store

public class Store
extends java.lang.Object

Store is the representation of the shop floor, container of the item list, currently browsing customers and the running checkouts. Controls the decision to toggle checkouts on and off as well as the creation of customers and passing them to checkouts when they have completed shopping.

Version:
2011,03,10
Author:
AngryPirates, Cabin boy Greg and Seaman Sam
